programme.title: Super Senses 2: Special Forces S1 - "ELITE CORPS"
programme.desc: Survival demands an edge. Witness some of the animals whose elite sensory abilities put them at the top of their game.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Megafloods"
programme.desc: Witness the devastating destructive power unleashed by planet earth’s most valuable resource – water.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Constructions"
programme.desc: Discover the worst bridge collapses and tunnel fires in history.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded S1 - "Hurricanes"
programme.desc: Explore with us one of the most destructive and deadliest hurricanes in history!

programme.title: Wonder S1 - "Phenomenal"
programme.desc: In this episode we learn the diference between Iridescence, Chemiluminescence and Bioluminescence. We also learn about Gemstone Coloration and Mechanical Plant Defenses.

programme.title: Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Bear Attack"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Treestand Accidents"
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Survival Science S1 - "Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: Military snipers are trained in a variety of skills: detection, stalking, camouflage, infiltration, special reconnaissance and target acquisition. Bottom line, a ton of cool shooting and science for Nick and Laura to explore!

programme.title: Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Lightning Strike"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick travel to a state-of-the-art Direct Effects Lightning Test Lab. With some “explosive” experiments, they’ll determine the power lightning and how it behaves? And they’ll find out how can hunters and fishermen best protect themselves?

programme.title: Trajectory S1 - "Satellites Lost & Found"
programme.desc: BEYOND EARTH ORBIT - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV RE-ENTRY VEHICLE - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. GALILEO SATELLITES LOST AND FOUND - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Trajectory S1 - "To the Moon"
programme.desc: TO THE MOON - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. DRAGON, FALCON AND SPACEX - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. GAIA - Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Trajectory S1 - "End of Apollo"
programme.desc: THE BEGINNING OF THE END - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. APOLLO GETS COMPLICATED - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: Trajectory S1 - "Return to Space"
programme.desc: THE SHUTTLE PROGRAM - The first re-useable spacecraft. THE CHALLENGER DISASTER - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. RETURN TO SPACE - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Space Dealers S1 - "Risk Taking, Money Making"
programme.desc: Torie and Larry duke it out on the auction floor for an incredible artefact. Cole meets astronaut Scott Parazynski who risked his life on one of the most daring spacewalks ever.

programme.title: Space Dealers S1 - "The Showdown"
programme.desc: Torie stakes her reputation on an Apollo 17 map used on the surface of the moon; Larry gets his hands on a one-of-a-kind Skylab prototype; and Cole acquires a mysterious homing beacon. To make big money and win the ticket Cole has to turn detective.

programme.title: The Lightbulb Moment S1 - "WIFI"
programme.desc: Actress Hedy Lamarr, “the world's most beautiful woman,” had a knack for inventing. During WWII, in an effort to help the Allies, she devised a technology designed to intercept Axis communications – and created the foundation of wireless internet.

programme.title: The Lightbulb Moment S1 - "STREAMING"
programme.desc: The early days of online video were plagued by low resolution and unbearable buffering times. But one day that all changed. In the late 90s, a breakthrough technology revolutionized streaming video, setting the foundation for the era of Netflix.

programme.title: The Lightbulb Moment S1 - "INTERSTATE"
programme.desc: Dwight Eisenhower’s interstate highway system was the biggest infrastructure project of its time, a bold plan to connect all corners of America and boost the economy. So how did it end up deepening the divide between rich and poor?

programme.title: The Lightbulb Moment S1 - "EDISON"
programme.desc: Edison pioneered the world’s first research and development center in Menlo Park, New Jersey, working with a group of experimenters to methodically zero in on the holy grail of electric light.

programme.title: Unearth S1 - "Life Beyond Earth"
programme.desc: We look closely at the search within our solar system, Mars, Titan and the ice moons. Speaking with experts in their fields of Mars robotic missions, Nuclear scientists probing the structure of ice on the distant moons.

programme.title: Unearth S1 - "The Next Great Extinction Event"
programme.desc: Experts explain our history and evolution of Earth over its 4 billion year history and take us through to the current emergency where humans may be one of the species to become extinct.

programme.title: Unearth S1 - "A.I. The Code For Consiousness?"
programme.desc: Hollywood has made us rather fearful of Artificial Intelligence, or A.I. But as we shall see, A.I. and its dance partner robotics might not be the nemesis we should fear; at least, not if we get them right.

programme.title: Unearth S1 - "Germ Warefare"
programme.desc: A new enemy is emerging. This new enemy is the natural world itself, a microscopic realm of bacteria. And not just any bacteria, but the so-called super-bugs. We'll look at the emerging threats and what scientists are doing to counter them.

programme.title: Secret Wars Uncovered S1 - "Kashmir Powder Keg"
programme.desc: With Kashmir’s special status removed in early August 2019 and terrorist attacks plaguing the region since earlier in the year, the India/Pakistani border-conflict has escalated once more.

programme.title: Secret Wars Uncovered S1 - "Secret War In Laos"
programme.desc: In efforts to remove the Communists, the US conducted a devastating military operation, making Laos the most bombed country per capita - ever. The Laos Civil War has often been called America’s “secret war.”

programme.title: Secret Wars Uncovered S1 - "Cold War In Central America"
programme.desc: In the 1980s, El Salvador and Nicaragua were fighting vicious civil wars that claimed killed at least 100,000, saw 8000 people disappear, and left hundreds of thousands displaced. Still spearheading a global fight against communism, the US engaged.

programme.title: Secret Wars Uncovered S1 - "Desert War In Mali"
programme.desc: It is a deadly war in the desert, one we know barely anything about. Once the heart of the golden Mali Empire, home to the richest man of the 14th century, the northern town of Timbuktu has become the victim of political instability and terror.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S1 - "Biomimicry/Mechanimals"
programme.desc: Join host Joe Penna as he explores how designers are using Manta Rays to change the way we explore the ocean’s depths.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S1 - "Robots For Hire"
programme.desc: Join host Joe Penna as he talks to astronauts, designers and factory workers as they describe how the robotic revolution is affecting the way we work.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S1 - "The Future of Food"
programme.desc: Host Joe Penna talks to the people who are creating the foods of the future and samples everything from test tube beef to edible insects.

programme.title: Xploration Earth 2050 S1 - "They Cyborgs Are Coming"
programme.desc: Join host Joe Penna as he discovers a search and rescue robot that doubles as a tank, cuddles a therapy robot designed to look, and act, like an actual pet, and tests a high tech fireman’s mask that has a lot more than X-ray vision.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain S1 - "Memory"
programme.desc: Jack meets the world memory champion and a man who can remember every day of his life.

programme.title: How to Bulid a City S1 - "Canberra"
programme.desc: Canberra is the youngest city to feature in our series; a mere “adolescent” in our rapidly urbanizing world. It stands out for all the right reasons as it affords those who live within its low-density realm a very privileged lifestyle indeed.
